name: Social Profile Linking
author: contact4sajid

sections.description:
This is a simple social profile linking plugin that allows you to easily insert social icons in your site! with shortcode or php code embed or through widget easily for use in template. It comes with good CSS styling, the icons are all RETINA-READY!

After installing the plugin you’ll have the new Social Profiles section found under Settings, where you can enter in the URLs of your social profiles for the services you use. If you do not enter a URL, that social icon will not appear.

Once you’ve added a few of your social link URLs, you need to insert them in your site. There are 3 ways to do this:

  • Firstly, you can do it using PHP – <?php echo spl_show_template(); ?>
  • Secondly, you can insert the spcial profile linking icons with the [spl] shortcode anywhere you’d like pages/posts.
  • Thirdly, you can insert through widget on any sidebar any where easily.

Social icon for Sites Included:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Tumblr
  • LinkedIn
  • Pinterest
  • Youtube
  • Vimeo
  • Instagram
  • Flickr
  • Github
  • Google+
  • Dribbble
  • Behance
  • SoundCloud
  • Spotify
  • Rdio
  • If you have any query or suggestion? Let me know!

Credits:

  • Social Profile Icons – ZURB
sections.installation:
How to install this plugin?

  1. Search for “Social Profile Linking” in the Add New Plugin section of your site or download it and upload it manually.
  2. Install and activate the plugin.
  3. Visit the dashboard under Social Profile > setting option show.
  4. Add in the URLs for all the social media profiles you want to display.
  5. Use it either with PHP or the Shortcode or through widget.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

How to install this plugin?

  1. Search for “Social Profile Linking” in the Add New Plugin section of your site or download it and upload it manually.
  2. Install and activate the plugin.
  3. Visit the dashboard under Social Profile > setting option show.
  4. Add in the URLs for all the social media profiles you want to display.
  5. Use it either with PHP or the Shortcode or through widget.

Can we add drag drop option for easily which we want first come to show and after next one etc

Yes, coming soon in next version

Can we advanced more featured options show/hide icon from widget and setting option

Yes, coming soon in next version

short_description: The Simple Way to Add Retina-Ready Social Media Icons to Your Site
description:
This is a simple social profile linking plugin that allows you to easily insert social icons in your site! with shortcode or php code embed or through widget easily for use in template. It comes with good CSS styling, the icons are all RETINA-READY!

After installing the plugin you’ll have the new Social Profiles section found under Settings, where you can enter in the URLs of your social profiles for the services you use. If you do not enter a URL, that social icon will not appear.

Once you’ve added a few of your social link URLs, you need to insert them in your site. There are 3 ways to do this:

  • Firstly, you can do it using PHP – <?php echo spl_show_template(); ?>
  • Secondly, you can insert the spcial profile linking icons with the [spl] shortcode anywhere you’d like pages/posts.
  • Thirdly, you can insert through widget on any sidebar any where easily.

Social icon for Sites Included:

screenshots.caption: Add widget on sidebar and in the URLs for all the social media profiles you want to display before and after icon hovered over.
Add Widget Options which type you want to show social profile "circle or square" icons.
Add Shortcode any where like pages/posts.
It show social profiles icon which filled textbox with url from setting options.
Setting option show type which you want "circle or square" icons and links you want to display.
PHP code use in template any where you want to display - <?php echo spl_show_template(); ?>
The Social Profile Icon hovered over display.
